lead_paragraph: Draymond Green and Klay Thompson were picked Thursday for the Western Conference team, giving the NBA champion Golden State Warriors three All-Stars for the first time in 40 years.

headline.print_headline: Green, Thompson Picked, Giving Warriors 3 NBA All-Stars
headline.main: Green, Thompson Picked, Giving Warriors 3 NBA All-Stars

snippet: Draymond Green and Klay Thompson were picked Thursday for the Western Conference team, giving the NBA champion Golden State Warriors three All-Stars for the first time in 40 years....
